Job Description: Job Title   : Software developer    Job Position   : Azure Developers    Description   :   -We are seeking who can design and develop Platform as a Service (PaaS) Solutions using different Azure services.   -Must be able to develop solutions on Azure for Cloud-Native implementation using Microsoft Technology Stack.   -Hands on experience in Visual Studio .NET, C#, SQL, ASP.NET MVC,   -.NET Core is essential.   -Good communication, presentation, problem-solving and team-working skills are essential.   -Candidates with little Azure knowledge can also be considered.    Qualification   : BE/BTech, MCA, MCS
